ygData.subject: RE: Nagafen 2; Sylly 0
ygData.msgSnippet: That is the problem I am facing... I have a lvl 50 necro on Veeshan. Unfortunatly Veeshan is owned by FoH so dragon runes are not a possibility. Both dragons
ygData.messageBody:
That is the problem I am facing... I have a lvl 50 necro on Veeshan.
Unfortunatly Veeshan is owned by FoH so dragon runes are not a possibility.
Both dragons are either Gm slain within 10 mins of server coming up or FoH
has a group or 18-24 people posted outside the FG and ICE giant area making
final preps for going in. Only rarely does FoH miss an oppertunity to kill
the dragons or a god. That's why I started my bard twink heh. Not much to do
wwith my necr. BTW off topic, but what are some good lvling areas for a
semi-twinked (still wanna learn to play the class as intended) lvl 8 bard.

Klayan Deathbringer (The Oracle) lvl 50 Necro
Celantra (The Oracle) lvl 8 semi-twink Bard


>From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Nagafen 2; Sylly 0
>Date: Wed, 5 Jan 2000 17:23:55 -0500 (EST)
>
> > I've never said or felt that you were an idiot, but I have noticed in
>recent
> > weeks that your attitude toward other players whos level hasn't caused
>them
> > a nosebleed (under 49 apparently) has deteriorated.
>
> Only on dragon raids and plane trips, you'll notice. I cannot stress
> waiting on dragon raids. Cause there ain't nothing else left after you
> do them. Make the level, and then kick back on dragons. Otherwise,
> you aren't gonna get anything else out of the game. I'm having great
> fun doing dragon planning and raiding planes. After you make L50,
> I've realized that the strain of making levels is lifted, and you can
> enjoy the game much more. Again, that's my take on it as people
> often like to disagree with me. But there is no excitement after
> you've done it all, in my opinion.
>
> Harm.
>
